skillTree.localised_description: When deadly Asrai spears are wielded, the wardance is an intricate performance ending in the foes' death.

effects.description:
Weapon choice: "Asrai Spear"
	
	Extra weapon choices are automatically unlocked when an agent is recruited, but must be manually enabled from Character Details panel.

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Forgoing armour, the Shadowdancers decorate themselves with swirling designs and dye their hair in bright colours.
Wardancer troupes are commonly led by a veteran Shadowdancer, these warriors fight to Loec's silent song.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Wardancer and Bladesinger units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Stalk for Wardancer and Bladesinger units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: They, and only they, know all the paths through Athel Loren — indeed, it is said that they tread the paths of the Dreaming Wood as surely as they do the mortal world.

effects.description:
Evasion chance when using the Worldroots: +5%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Shadowdancers are the closest thing that the Trickster God has to a priesthood, and they are both respected and feared as a result.

effects.description:
Barrier hit points: +500 for Wardancer and Bladesinger units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: A conjured shadow is just as obfuscating as a real one - the Shadow Wizard is master or mistress of the 'concealing' arts.
When cast, this spell enfeebles enemy minds; they feel the crushing weight of reality bearing down upon them.
The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.
A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.
The supernatural solution is often the best; weapons materialise before the caster's allies, allowing them to slice through flesh, soul, and consciousness.
The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.
Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.
There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.
This ritualistic war dance requires neither rhythm nor order, enabling evasion of the enemy’s clumsy attacks, and lethal counterattacks.
The Shadowdancer rain blow after blow upon their opponent, moving with such speed that the eye cannot follow each distinct cut and thrust.
Each strike of a Shadowdancer's blade is made with uncanny precision, capable of severing a head or piercing a heart with one deceptively elegant stroke.
Once consumed by Loec’s aspect, one can instinctively evade attack through trickery, mimicking his deception of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Possessed by the Trickster God"

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
This unit can pass through trees.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one is not at all easy to kill, and many have tried, believe me.
"I see something wrong and I fix it with my hands."

effects.description:
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Armies can be mended as surely as people can, up to a point of course.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

backgroundSkills.localised_description: On occasion, throwing the whole nine leagues at the enemy is just the ticket.
You don't want to be on the wrong side of this one's ire - it's explosive to say the least!
This one utilizes illusions and other tricks, which she inevitably uses to further distract her foes or mete out a much-needed dose of humility to Elves or spirits that have forgotten their station.
In battle, Shadowdancers are even more dazzlingly swift than other Wardancers.
A secret kept is a favour to be returned at a later time.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
	(enemy characters in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Shadowdancer's actions have gleaned the favour of the Queen of Athel Loren.
Never short of new ideas, or new ways of looking at old problems.
As a guardian, the Warrioress is sworn to protect everything that Asrai hold dear.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This warrior is one with their spear; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Bonus vs. Large: +8 (when using Asrai Spear)

Recruit rank: +1 for Wardancers (Asrai Spears)
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This warrior is one with their swords; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Bonus vs. Infantry: +8 (when using Dual Swords)

Recruit rank: +1 for Wardancers (Dual Swords)
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: As an envoy of Ariel, the Shadowdancer speaks with the authority of the Queen of Athel Loren.
